title: Reminiscing on the Legend of the Poro King
body:
Poro mode is gone =( 
I loved the new element of the Poro King. Made things much more interesting and made the games' favour swing so rapidly! So much fun! Alas, it is now gone =(

Continue to bring us such fun game modes Riot!

replies.body: Ah, I have fond memories of being bored of it after a day and constantly being invited to it by someone who insists on playing with me.
